title: Credit Repair Disputer
job_overview:
The Credit Disputer is responsible for preparing and submitting credit disputes on behalf of clients to credit bureaus and creditors. This role requires strong attention to detail, excellent communication skills, and a solid understanding of credit reporting laws such as the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA).

Key Responsibilities:
Analyze client credit reports from major credit bureaus (Equifax, Experian, and TransUnion)
Identify inaccurate, outdated, or unverifiable information
Prepare and submit dispute letters to credit bureaus and/or creditors
Track dispute statuses and follow up as needed
Update client records with dispute outcomes
Maintain compliance with all relevant regulations and company policies
Communicate with clients regarding progress and expectations
Stay up to date on credit repair industry trends and best practices

Qualifications:
Experience in credit repair or financial services preferred
Knowledge of credit reporting laws (FCRA, FDCPA, etc.)
Strong written communication and organizational skills
Comfortable using CRM systems and digital tools
High attention to detail and data accuracy
Ability to manage multiple client files simultaneously
Bilingual is a plus, but not required

Familiar with CRC is Mandatory!!
Knowledge of:

Equifax data Breach
3b sweep
Transunion sweep
FTC
Identity Theft Affidavits
inquiry removal


Someone who is knowledgeable with Chex systems/ EWS processing
